page.title: 02CONSERVATION.
page.content: Leicester City Wildlife Project is part of Leicestershire and Rutland Trust of Nature Conservation.It looks after plants and animals in the city. The city has become more important for conservation since modern agricultural machinery is ripping up hedgerows,cutting down woods,draining ponds,spraying herbicides and pesticides in the pursuit of more productive farming. Watch is a nationwide group for young people.It aims to help children be more aware of the neighbourhood and how man changes the environment. Projects are hard work but good fun. In Knighton Spinney Watch has planted more hazel trees and has had a sponsored bird watch.The next project is a butterfly survey.
